meanings.sent1: The unnailed sign kept falling over in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The picture frame was unnailed and needed to be fixed.
meanings.sent3: The unnailed chair made for a funny surprise when it collapsed.
meanings.sent4: Her unnailed promise felt fragile and easily broken.
meanings.sent5: The unnailed door creaked open with each gust of wind.

meanings.sent1: The unnailed shelf wobbled dangerously when touched.
meanings.sent2: The unnailed floorboard squeaked under their weight.
meanings.sent3: The unnailed ladder seemed to play a game of 'will it hold?'
meanings.sent4: His unnailed plan fell apart at the first obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The unnailed fence swayed in the breeze, waiting to be fixed.

meanings.sent1: The unnailed curtain fluttered in the open window.
meanings.sent2: The unnailed rope slipped from his grasp.
meanings.sent3: The unnailed painting looked like it was floating on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her unnailed necklace slipped off and disappeared into the grass.
meanings.sent5: The unnailed plank of wood lay loose on the ground, waiting to be used.
